title: Chiles en nogada (Mexican stuffed chillies in walnut sauce)
ingredients: ['8 poblano chillies', 'Filling', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '750g minced pork', '350g peeled, seeded and chopped tomatoes', '1 small bunch fresh parsley, chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped blanched almonds', '2 tablespoons raisins', '2 tablespoons chopped candied orange peel or crystallised cactus', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', '4 cloves, ground', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 apple, chopped', '1 peach, chopped', '1 ripe plantain, chopped', 'Sauce', '450ml milk', "150g soft goat's cheese", '300g walnuts', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 (2.5cm) piece cinnamon stick', 'Garnish', '250g pomegranate seeds', '1 handful chopped fresh parsley']
